Description: Necklace in the form of a string of alternating spherical garnet beads and solid-cast gold fly amulets. Possibly a fake.
Curator's comments: Published: Gold and Civilisation, Catalogue (Australia 2001): p.120 For fly-necklaces, see Egypt’s Golden Age (exhibition catalogue, Boston, 1982): 238-9 [no.315].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 13 Mar-24 Jun, Australia, Canberra, National Museum of Australia, Gold and Civilisation 2001 19 Jul-21 Oct, Australia, Melbourne, Museum Victoria, Gold and Civilisation
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
